Text:
This is a conversion of the 8 melite-hl-720p mkv files to dvd5.

It has a simple menu with all 8 episodes and the audio is converted to 6 channels.

THE SCREENSHOTS IN THE COMMENT ABOVE ARE NOT !!!!!!!! FROM MY RELEASE.

@ frohtsgtes
Do not post bullshit please you are not helping.

Hiya - are you sure the aspect ratio is correct on this burn? The planets are all rather oval...
I'm wondering if it was supposed to be 1.85:1 or 2.35:1 - not 1.78:1 as it's presented here?
Either that, or all round things in Halo are oval, I guess!

After a little finding out, I've figured out that this IS presented in an incorrect aspect ratio - it's not supposed to fill a 16:9 screen like 1.78:1 does, but have letterbox stripes as it's a 1.85:1 release - therefore all round objects are obviously presented as oval. 
Thanks for the effort though, uploader - it sucks when this shit happens!
If it matters, of course.
Me, I'm a real fusspot.

@ cinesimon 
Yep something must have went wrong.
Don't know if it can be corrected with gomplayer or some other.
Anyway sorry for the screw up.

THIS RELEASE HAS NO MORE SUPPORT FROM ME.

I UPPED 200+ GIG OF IT AND THE REST IS UP TO YOU GUYS.

FILES WILL BE DELETED FROM MY SYSTEM.
